lines.text: This afternoon, we had a long telephone conversation earlier in the day.
Plastic surgery, at times, seems to me to be very, VERY complicated.
They've had my picture in the files so long it's getting moldy.
How can a great doctor have such a jerk for a son?
No, Dr. Gregor's a great man, both in his personal life and his business life.
Sounds like a man I'd like to meet.
You probably will, next time we pick up Don Gregor.
You know that gun is jail bait!
Honey, that's bad business, cop killing.
So what? They bleed like anybody else. Now stop gibbering! I gotta think!
